sources.title: Monsieur Beaucaire (1946)
sources.description: A bumbling barber in the court of King Louis XV becomes engaged in political intrigue when he masquerades as a dashing nobleman engaged to the princess of Spain. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/monsieur-beaucaire-1946/

metadata.Plot: Beaucaire is a barber for the royal French court which becomes a real "royal pain" for the king. As a result he is sent to the guillotine - however he is saved by the Duc de Chandre, who rescues and transports him to the Spanish court. While there Beaucaire poses as a nobleman. The only problem is, he gets into even more trouble.
metadata.Writer: Melvin Frank, Norman Panama, Booth Tarkington
metadata.Actors: Bob Hope, Joan Caulfield, Patric Knowles
